details.SLURM: The script uses SLURM for job submission and resource management. It requests 64 tasks with 2 CPUs per task, 16 GB of memory, and a wall time of 5 days.
details.GROMACS: GROMACS is used for molecular dynamics simulations. The script performs a NPT equilibration run.
details.OpenMPI: OpenMPI is used for parallel execution of GROMACS when running on multiple nodes. The script checks the number of nodes and adjusts the MPI command accordingly.
